attributes.title: are you kidding me
attributes.review: i downloaded this and my dog FLEW into the atmosphere and my sister got lice bro. i tried to go into the app and it would only play shawty’s like a melody in my head that i can’t get out got me singing like nana everyday like my ipods stuck on replay replay. really trying to make apps 🤡 i would rather lick mold than use this app again. and why does it have so many ads for like games it feels like i downloaded an all just for commercials what the heck bro this is stupid. nice try but don’t do it again.

attributes.title: Absolutely awful!

attributes.title: WORST PRESIDENT EVER
attributes.review: WORST APP, WORST PRESIDENT, WORST 4 YEARS OF MY LIFE, RESIGN ALREADY

The rating is a lie. I’d give this app zero out of five stars. I seriously wish I could give this less than one star. 

This app was absolutely horrible. Within minutes of downloading this app, I had issues. This awful app destroyed my home on Jupiter, made my iPhone 21 catch fire, caused my dog to suddenly levitate and accidentally fly away, and made me lose even more faith in humanity. I would not recommend this app to anyone.

attributes.title: not worth ur time
attributes.review: I can't believe this app, so poorly made, is on the app store. It took forever to download, it's super difficult to navigate and it takes up way too much space on my phone. Absolutely do not download.

attributes.title: Too much orange
attributes.review: Yeah, this is the absolute worst app I have ever used. No matter how many times I adjust my screens brightness, I’m blinded by orange. ORANGE!
